channel.title: Unlimited Sprint
channel.description: I need help with making a ring either turn u into a npc or give you unlimited sprint! if it is possible please help me out im using delta please and thank you!

item.title: Unlimited Sprint
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Unlimited sprint ring:

Add this to your public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) { method ### = item ID

if(wearID == ###){ playerEnergy += 2147000; }

Npc ring thingy. same place. add this $$$ = what you want char too look like (-1 for nothing)

if(wearID == ###){ pHead = $$$$$; //head pBeard = $$$$$; // beard pTorso = $$$$$; // torso pArms = $$$$$; // arms pHands = $$$$$; // hands pLegs = $$$$$;// leggs pFeet = $$$$$;// feet pHairC = $$$$$;// hair pTorsoC = $$$$$;//torso pLegsC = $$$$$;//legs pFeetC = $$$$$;//feet pSkinC = $$$$$;//skin }

Read full topic
